features: Premium Alkaline AA Batteries, 30 Pack of Rayovac Fusion Batteries
No AA Alkaline Battery Lasts Longer on ANSI Average Performance Tests
Excels in High-Powered Devices – High-Tech Toys, Game Controllers, Wireless Headsets & More
Designed to Prevent Damaging Battery Leaks & Tested Twice Prior to Shipment

body.description: These premium AA Alkaline Batteries excel in today's power-hungry devices including high-powered toys, video game controllers, wireless headsets and more. Plus, they’re designed to prevent damaging battery leaks and tested twice prior to shipment to ensure reliability.These Double A batteries contain power rings for consistent performance and a max capacity can for safely containing and delivering maximum power. Specially formulated for power-hungry, High-Tech devices, the energy-dense Rayovac Fusion premium formula provides more power than Rayovac High Energy. No competitor’s alkaline batteries outlast Rayovac Fusion Premium Alkaline AA Batteries*. *Average ANSI performance Test

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Designed to prevent pesky leaks and tested twice for reliability before they’re shipped your way. Ideal for today's most power hungry devices like game controllers, wireless headsets, high powered toys, and more. Built to last and backed by over 110 years of battery perfecting experience. That’s performance you can trust.

High Energy Alkaline Batteries NiMH Rechargeable Batteries Coin, Electronic & Photo Batteries Available Sizes AA, AAA, C, D & 9V AA, AAA & Battery Charger Various Sizes - 123A, CR2032, CR2025 & many more Key Features Great batteries at a great value for everyday devices! Rechargeable batteries you can use again and again. Excellent performance & value for specialty devices. Best Uses Toys, Flashlights, Remotes, Smart Home Devices & More High-Tech Toys, Game Controllers, Wireless Headsets & More Camera Equipment, Home Security, Key Fobs, Medical Devices & More Shelf Life AA, AAA, C, D – Up to 10 Years in Storage; 9V – Up to 5 Years in Storage Up to 5 Years (total usable life under typical usage patterns) Coin – Up to 10 Years in Storage; Electronic – Up to 3 Years in Storage; Photo – Up to 10 Years in Storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy and satisfied with purchase.
reviews.reviewText: Just what I needed and the price was good. Thanks to the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like the batteries the only bad thing is the bears like them also had my camera out only 1 day before a bear found it and tried to get the batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product Great.....Amazon Delivery, Not So Much!
reviews.reviewText: I've had great luck with these batteries. Good performance at a good price. On the other hand, I just love how Amazon uses the good common sense to deliver these in an envelope instead of a box. I basically got a gag full of loose batteries. Five stars for the batteries, one star for Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great battery as good as regular RAYOVAC AA
reviews.reviewText: I have bought 30 of these AA Fusion batteries two times in the past two years. Truthfully they last about as long as regular RAYOVAC High Energy batteries. So why buy them...not any more they cost twice as much and last about the same. They just are not much better for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a band
reviews.reviewText: In our band we go through a lot of batteries. I was skeptical about using some thing that I perceived as being a non-namebrand battery for critical band gear. I use these for in ear monitors. They are fantastic! They last longer than the namebrand batteries and are significantly cheaper. In addition, my son loves these batteries for his Xbox controller. They seem to last much longer than rechargeable batteries or other name brand batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best brand out there
reviews.reviewText: I will never buy Energizer/everready or any other brand of battery except Royovac...my handyman said these are best, and they are. These are a bit more $$, but beats changing them out so often. I order most everything from Amazon...right to your door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Batteries for flashlights and heavy-use devices like security cameras and more
reviews.reviewText: These are excellent batteries. They....* Have a lot of power* Have excellent storage duration time* Do not leak* Are more than capable of running electronics that require continuous use, like wireless security cameras, flashlights, radio control cars, portable charging devices that use batteries as a power source.These batteries beat the best Duracell batteries out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These batteries are the worst that I've ever experienced. Over the past 3-4 years, I have purchased several AA & AAA packages. Every single pack had leaking issues that caused extensive cleaning of the battery compartments in my electronics. I contacted the company and they sent me a $20 voucher. After continuous issues and from multiple lots, I ended up throwing the voucher away. My electronics deserve much better. Rayovac and Energizer are the same company so purchase at your own risk. I'm using Duracell now with none of the leaking issues that these displayed.

Excelente adquisición. El envío llego antes de la fecha programada. Sellado. Utilice 12 pilas en un medidor digital de resistencia de aislamiento y en 2 lámparas de LED. Es muy poco tiempo para opinar de lo "técnico". Espero ampliar el comentario.

reviews.reviewTitle: NOT AS GOOD AS THE DURACELL OR ENERGIZERS
reviews.reviewText: Well tried these batteries and they are NOT as good as the Duracell Copper Tops or the Energizers. The other problem was the packaging with arrived in a bag with all the batteries loose from their container. The only thing reasonable was the cost.Back to the Duracell's and Energizers for me, they just last longer.

I have had excellent results using Rayovac Fusion batteries. I was about to make a substantial purchase to stock up on AA's and Amazon is saying they are out of stock? No mention if they are getting more in. The bizarre thing is that with the AAA version of this offering they are in stock and "more are on the way" was the message last time inventory was low. Last time I checked, the AA version of this product offering is NOT discontinued. It is obviously a wildly popular item, therefore, my message to Amazon.ca is to PLEASE BRING IN MORE INVETORY so we can make purchases!!!
J'ai reçu un paquet déjà ouvert, j'ai des doutes que les batteries soient déjà usagées. Les batteries étaient toutes dans le sac de livraison, sorties du contenant.
Plenty of power to light battery powered fixture.
